descriptionHtml:
Simple user interface to (re)allocate perks.
Allows you to add/remove perks one by one or reset entire perk tree and regain perk points.

[b]Compatibility[/b]
Dawnguard is supported (Werewolf and Vampire Lord perks) but is not required to install or use this mod.
This mod does not have support for a mod that adds new perks or changes original perks and/or their positions in the tree.

[b]Requirements[/b]
* TESV 1.8.151 (or newer)
* [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] 1.6.9 (or newer)
* [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url] 3.3 (or newer)

[b]Installation and Use[/b]
1. Install SKSE
2. Install SkyUI
3. Install Perks UI
4. Launch the game with SKSE
5. Use in-game Mod Configuration Menu (which is part of SkyUI) to access Perks UI

[b]Localization[/b]
English (fully localized)
Russian (fully localized)
French (skill/perk names and descriptions)
German (skill/perk names and descriptions)
Italian (skill/perk names and descriptions)
Spanish (skill/perk names and descriptions)
Czech (skill/perk names and descriptions)
Polish (skill/perk names and descriptions)
Japanese (entirely in English)
